channel.description: Recent content in ML on EricWang's Blog

item.title: GAN基础
item.description: GAN Course 1 —— Build Basic GANs 1.1 Introduction Generative Models: Variational Autoencoders(VAE): GANS: GAN in Real Life GAN的创始人：Ian Goodfellow GAN的应用领域： Image Generation, Deep fake Text Generation Data Augmentaion Image Filters 1.2 Basic Components Discriminator Use Neural Networks, input: features(image), output: probability 0.85这个概率也会交给Generator Input features e.g.: RGB pixel values for images Generator Use Neural Networks, input: class+nose vector, output: features(image)
